name: com.pixeldog.jwplayer
description: A sample Apache Cordova application that responds to the deviceready event.

scripts.a: rmdir "./plugins/cordova-jwplayer" /q /s && cordova platform remove android && cordova platform add android && cls && cordova run android --device
scripts.aa: cordova platform remove android && cordova platform add android && cls && cordova run android --device

author: Apache Cordova Team
